/// define error
enum YourError:Error {
    case NoMoney
    case NoHoney
    case Chiou
}

do {
    let result = try foo()
} catch YourError.NoHoney {
    print("single" + "ğŸ¶")
} catch let why as YourError {
    print(why) // rename 'error' as 'why'
}
